Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowTheme Implements IDisposable
public ref class WorkflowTheme sealed : IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 为设计时环境中的工作流提供外观属性设置。

span.span: Provides the look and feel property settings to a workflow in design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流主题定义工作流设计图面的外观。Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface. 这包括为工作流定义的背景样式、前景样式、字体以及图标。This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow. 是为特定工作流定义的主题。A is a theme defined for a specific workflow. 如果不需要特定的工作流主题，则可以使用 类以设置为默认属性。The class can be used for default properties if a specific workflow theme is not desired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 描述工作流设计图面的外观。The describes the look and feel of a workflow design surface. 这包括为工作流设计图面定义的背景样式、前景样式、字体以及图标。This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问 `AmbientTheme` 属性。The following example demonstrates how to access the `AmbientTheme` property. 此示例摘自“跟踪配置文件设计器”SDK 示例。This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[跟踪配置文件设计器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
